name: Computer Club
description:
Computer Club is a visual novel exclusively for adults! In this game you will be told the story of two sexy lesbians who work in a computer club. But instead of work, they decided to have hot sex! The game is filled with sex scenes, humor and romance.
In this incredibly interesting game you have to plunge into the history of two hot lesbians who work in a computer club. Ella was working hard, but Avery had other plans for the evening... Avery closed the front door so that no one would interfere with her sex. What happened next you will see in the game. Get real pleasure from a very simple gameplay and cool music.
Beautiful graphics!
Relaxing music!
Exciting sex scenes!
